ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 125
ygData.msgSnippet: Get a caster buddy then root and shoot then...or just leave him alone. What do the pair of them drop? And what does Pyzgin drop? Shimmering Orb or something
ygData.messageBody:
Get a caster buddy then root and shoot then...or just leave him alone. What
do the pair of them drop? And what does Pyzgin drop? Shimmering Orb or
something wierd for mage types (I be a shaman, so have no interest in it).

-----Original Message-----
From: Jared Hughes [mailto:jaredh@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 4:36 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Digest Number 125


From: "Jared Hughes" <jaredh@...>

Kiting him is next to impossible, he casts the necro line of darkness spells
on you, which makes you feel like you are creeping, and i had jboots and it
was like i was 180/65 overweight. can't kite under those conditions

Veldra Rae`lynn
lvl 32 magician
Veeshan


-----Original Message-----
From: Gryphon nolastname [mailto:gryphon114@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 4:18 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 125


From: "Gryphon nolastname" <gryphon114@...>


Varsoon was yellow to me at 24, so he was level 25 or 26 that time he
spawned. He has a nasty DD spell that he likes to cast a lot, as well as a
couple of DoT's and a pet. He hits for about 40, and drops jack.

The problem is "Varsoon the Undying", a zombie, that spawns when you kill
him. Varsoon the Undying was level 30 (even con) when I killed Varsoon, and
he hits for 70 - 80, double. I don't think he is a spell caster, so I guess
you could kite him it you are careful. Just watch that you don't kite him
into the guards, some of whom will make short work of him.

It is hard to solo him, because you will probably be low mana and health
from killing Varsoon and getting hit with his DoT's. I suggest a group
approach for this reason, or an agreement to the effect of, "I'll kill
varsoon, you get his zombie", so you are full health and mana when you take
him on.

-Ma`ar, Innoruuk


>
>What lvls are Varsoon and Pyzgin? I seek revenge upon Varsoon for an
>earlier
>death.
>
>Wizaro Wrathcaster
>Solusek Ro
